%B[SSN]: Composite estimate of sunspot-based reconstruction of near-Earth
%magnetic field intensity, B, over the period 1750-2013. Obtained via
%comparisaon with B[GEO].
%
%Time series fully described in:
%
%Near-Earth Heliospheric Magnetic Field Intensity Since 1800. Part 1:
%Geomagnetic and Sunspot Reconstructions
%M.J. Owens, E. Cliver, K.G. McCracken, J. Beer, L. Barnard, M. Lockwood,
%A. Rouillard, D. Passos, P. Riley, I. Usoskin, Y-M. Wang, J. Geophys. Res.,
%doi:10.xxx.xxxxx, 2016
%
%Columns are:
%1 - Calendar year
%2 - B[SSN] (best estimate from median of ensemble), in nT
%3 - B[SSN] upper 90% confidence interval, in nT
%4 - B[SSN] lower 90% confidence interval, in nT
%
